name: my_sql_db
description: connection to a my sql db.
help: This plugin allows you to declare a global connection to a my sql database. Other connections that declare tables, can rely on this plugin to maintain a connection with the database. The plugin requires a URL to the server running the database, a username and password for logging into the server and the name of the database to use. This database already has to be created.
author: Deebobo
